### Summary

Interaction dataset:

- Database: `r nwa@summary$db[, "name"]`
- Species: `r nwa@summary$db[, "species"]`
- Node Number: `r nwa@summary$db[, "node No"]`
- Edge Number: `r nwa@summary$db[, "edge No"]`

FDR for score calculation: `r nwa@summary$para[, "FDR"]`


Subnetwork identified:

- Node Number: `r length(V(nwa@result$subnw))`
- Edge Number: `r length(E(nwa@result$subnw))`
